attributes.action: Get all companies to deliver to BFPO addresses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am in the RAF based at JSSU Episkopi in Cyprus. I am having a lot of trouble with UK companies not delivering things or recognising BFPO as an official address. Why should I and countless others, miss out on benefits or service because we are in the Armed Forces regardless of the fact that we live on British Sovereign soil. I would like all companies to recognise BFPO and provide the same service you would get if you were living on the mainland.
